directions: Stir Seasoning Mix and mashed avocados in medium bowl until well blended. Stir in hummus. Cover surface with plastic wrap.
Refrigerate 30 minutes to allow flavors to blend. Stir before serving. Serve with pita chips or tortilla chips.
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) package McCormick® Guacamole Seasoning Mix
2 ripe avocados - peeled, pitted, and mashed
title: California Guacamole Hummus
